room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Awesome FUN! We did the Patient Zero room with a zombie to chase us for added excitement. Great fun for a night out! Worth the money. We can't stop talking about our night. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Had an absolutely amazingly fun time at Xtreme Escape Rooms! My group did the Time Bomb room...so much fun! Challenging, yet we escaped with about 7 minutes to spare. Encourages problem solving, teamwork, and cooperation...highly recommend this as a fun group date night or girls night out. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: It didn't take long before the adrenaline started to pump, fighting the clock, solving puzzles, searching for clues and yes, running away from Patient Zero. You know he's an actor, but boy oh boy do you get your money's worth with this added element of fright! Very creative puzzles and overall Hollywood style environment! Can't wait to do the other themed rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Brought some out of town guests with us and had a blast! Patient Zero with the real monster in the room added an extra level of excitement. Be prepared to run! We were able to complete it with only 3 or so minutes left. Cant wait for the Time Bomb room.
